string-array.name: relaxation_description
string-array.item: Listen to binaural sounds and beats. An old method discovered by Heinrich Wilhelm Dove that had proven itself as relaxative and meditative.
Although considered a bit psudoscience, from ancient times color has been used to balance the energy in one\'s body on many levels.
CBT is proven psychiatric (talkative) method for helping people with depression and/or anxiety but useful for other states also. Get to know the basics.
A level behind the hypnotherapy, the suggestive therapy is a combination between the binaural beats and compulsive repeating of positive triggers.
A good old meditation does wonders. Learn how to do it properly in few articles that we have prepared.
